result.title: Final DMP and report on RRI and societal impact
result.description: This report will deliver the final version of the PIMCity data management plan following the FAIR Data Management guidelines and template published by H2020 programme T71 The report will also include the consolidated final report with all evidence gathered from the monitoring of the implementation of RRI as a crosscutting issue in PIMCity and the societal impact of PIMCity during the last 6 months of the project T73

result.description: Data Management Plan will be prepared in compliance with EC rules and will cover the handling of data during and after the project lifetime the rules for collecting processing using and generating data and the standards to be applied It will state the base for partners participation in the Pilot on Open Research Data in Horizon 2020
